articles.description: The service will begin end of this week and scale up gradually.Big Bazaar has over 285 stores in over 150 cities. It will use this wide network of stores to enable order fulfilment

articles.title: Tata Power takes over power distribution in northeastern Odisha - Mint
articles.description: Tata Power's consumer base now stands at 11.5 million spread across Mumbai, New Delhi, Odisha and Ajmer and is the largest private sector power distribution company in the country
articles.content: MUMBAI: Tata Power, has taken over the management and operations of NESCO--North Eastern Electricity Supply Company of Odisha--upon completion of the sale process, the company said today.NESCO will n… [+1298 chars]

articles.title: Pfizer says COVID-19 vaccine protection lasts at least 6 months - Saudi Gazette
articles.description: The ongoing Phase 3 clinical trial of Pfizer/BioNTech's coronavirus vaccine confirms its protection lasts at least six months after the second dose, the manufacturer said on Thursday.
articles.content:
NEW YORK The ongoing Phase 3 clinical trial of Pfizer/BioNTech's coronavirus vaccine confirms its protection lasts at least six months after the second dose, the manufacturer said on Thursday.
